required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ASP8302 Single and Multiple Ascending Oral Dose Study in Non-elderly Healthy Japanese Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: ASP8302 Phase 1 Study - A Placebo-controlled, Single and Multiple Ascending Oral Dose Study in Non-elderly Healthy Japanese Male and Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetic of single/multiple ascending oral doses of ASP8302 in non-elderly healthy Japanese male and female subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety assessed by incidence of adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in single ascending dose (SAD) part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events will be coded using Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities (MedDRA).

primary_outcome.measure: Safety assessed by vital signs: Body temperature
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in multiple ascending dose (MAD) part
primary_outcome.description: To assess vital signs as a criteria of safety variables.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety assessed by vital signs: Blood pressure
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: To assess vital signs as a criteria of safety variables.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety assessed by vital signs: Pulse rate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: To assess vital signs as a criteria of safety variables.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with laboratory value abnormalities and/or AEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: Number of participants with potentially clinically significant laboratory values.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: To assess the cardiovascular system function as a criteria of safety variables.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 6 in SAD part Up to Day 19 in MAD part
primary_outcome.description: To assess the cardiovascular system function as a criteria of safety variables.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK) parameter for ASP8302: Maximum observed concentration (Cmax) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 1 and Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Time of the Maximum Concentration (tmax) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 1 and Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Area under the concentration-time curve (AUC) from the time of dosing to 24h after dosing (AUC24) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 1 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: AUC from the Time of Dosing Extrapolated to Time Infinity (AUCinf) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: AUC from the Time of Dosing to the Start of the Next Dosing Interval (AUCtau) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Peak-Trough Ratio (PTR) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Accumulation Ratio for AUC (Rac(AUC)) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Accumulation Ratio for Cmax (Rac(Cmax)) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: AUC from the Time of Dosing to the Last Measurable Concentration (AUClast) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Time Point Prior to the Time Point Corresponding to the First Measurable (Non-zero) Concentration (tlag) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Terminal Elimination Half-life (t1/2) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Apparent Volume of Distribution during the Terminal Elimination Phase After Single Extra-Vascular Dosing (Vz/F) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Apparent Total Systemic Clearance After Single or Multiple Extra-Vascular Dosing (CL/F) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Concentration Immediately Prior to Dosing at Multiple Dosing (Ctrough) in plasma
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Amount excreted into urine from the time of dosing to the 72 hours after dosing (Ae72) in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Fraction excreted into urine from the time of dosing to the 72 hours after dosing (Ae72%) in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Renal clearance (CLR) in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 72 hr after dosing in SAD part Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Amount excreted into urine over the time interval between consecutive dosing (Aetau) in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK parameter for ASP8302: Fraction excreted into urine over the time interval between consecutive dosing (Aetau%) in urine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PK of ASP8302 in MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamic (PD) parameter for ASP8302: Pupil diameter
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hr after dosing in SAD part Up to Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PD of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

secondary_outcome.measure: PD parameter for ASP8302: Salivary secretion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 hr after dosing in SAD part Up to Day 14 in MAD part
secondary_outcome.description: To assess the PD of ASP8302 in SAD part and MAD part.

arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP8302.
Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP8302.
Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP8302.
Subjects will receive a single dose of ASP8302.
Subjects will receive a single dose of Placebo.
Subjects will receive once daily dosing of ASP8302 for 14 consecutive days at the same dose level.
Subjects will receive once daily dosing of ASP8302 for 14 consecutive days at the same dose level.
Subjects will receive once daily dosing of Placebo for 14 consecutive days.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body weight at screening: ≥ 50.0 kg and < 80.0 kg for male, ≥ 40.0 kg and < 70.0 kg for female.
- Body-mass index (BMI) at screening: ≥ 17.6 kg/m2 and < 26.4 kg/m2 [BMI = Body weight (kg) ÷ {Body height (m)2}].
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who participated or are scheduled to participate in any clinical trials or post-marketing studies within 120 days before screening test or during the screening test to the hospital admission (Day −2).
- Subjects who conducted or is scheduled to conduct any of the blood donation or blood drawing in designated period before Day −2
- Subject who received or is scheduled to receive any medications within seven days before the hospital admission.
- Any deviation from any of the normal range of blood pressure, pulse rate, body temperature and standard 12-lead electrocardiogram at screening or on the day of hospital admission (Day −1).
- Subject who meets any of the criteria for laboratory tests at screening or on the day of hospital admission (Day −2).
- Any deviation from the normal range of routine 12-lead electrocardiogram at screening.
- Subjects with a complication or history of drug allergies.
- Subjects who developed upper gastrointestinal symptoms within seven days before the hospital admission.
- Subjects with a complication or history of hepatic disease.
- Subjects with a complication or history of cardiac disease.
- Subjects with a complication or history of respiratory disease except for history of asthma in childhood.
- Subjects with a complication or history of gastrointestinal disease except for a history of appendicitis.
- Subjects with a history of gastrointestinal resection except for appendicitis.
- Subjects with a complication or history of renal disease except for a history of calculus.
- Subjects with a complication or history of endocrine disease.
- Subjects with a complication or history of cerebrovascular disease.
- Subjects with a complication or history of malignant tumor.
- Subjects who received ASP8302 previously.
- Subjects who have a habit of excessive smoking or drinking alcohol.
